Add.Name: ForumShortname
Add.Label: Forum Shortname
Add.HelpText: The website account (a forum on Disqus) this system belongs to.

Add.Name: Developer
Add.Label: Developer
Add.HelpText: If 'False' (default), Disqus will not attempt to read the location of your page and validate the URL. 'False' is recommended when testing on an inaccessible website.
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Bool.CheckBox" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param name="ItemLabel" value="Developer Mode" /></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: ForumShortname
Add.Label: Forum Shortname
Add.HelpText: The website account (a forum on Disqus) this system belongs to.

Add.Name: Mode
Add.Label: Mode
Add.HelpText: The mode the comments will be displayed in ('Recent' by default)
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Combination,Recent,Popular,Top" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: Items
Add.Label: Items to display
Add.HelpText: The number of items to display (5 by default)

Add.Name: ModeratorsRanking
Add.Label: Moderators Ranking
Add.HelpText: If 'True', it shows the moderators in ranking ('False' by default)

Add.Name: ColorTheme
Add.Label: Color Theme
Add.HelpText: The color theme to use ('Blue' by default)
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Blue,Grey,Green,Red,Orange" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: DefaultTabView
Add.Label: Default Tab View
Add.HelpText: The default tab view ('Recent' by default)
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="People,Recent,Popular" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>

Add.Name: ExcerptLength
Add.Label: Comment Excerpt Length
Add.HelpText: The length of the comment excerpt (200 by default)

Add.Name: AvatarSize
Add.Label: Avatar Size
Add.HelpText: The size of an avatar (48 by default)
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="24,32,48,92,128" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>
